attributes.action: have a full investigation into St Peters Hospital, Chertsey, Middlesex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had an awful time at St Peters hospital, both me and my Daughter could have died because of their neglect. I have heard other stories about this hospital, this needs to stop before more people loose loved ones and innocent people die because they are not given the right care. This hospital and they way in which it cares for paitents needs to be investigated and actions taken to stop this happening again and again.

rejection.details: Please be more specific about what should be investigated.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
